sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , B.PRT_KOR_NM , A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.CMPL_YR , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM1 , A.APP_AGENT_CODE AS SCTMC , A.USE_NO , A.FEE_TP , C.FEE_TP_KOR_NM , A.FISCAL_YR||'-'||A.SOC_NO YR_NO , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_CALL_LETTER@YGPA_P2MGR(A.VSSL_KEY) CALL_LETTER , A.VSSL_KEY , (SELECT VSSL_NM FROM P2MGR.VSSL_ARVL_F@YGPA_P2MGR WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND YR = A.YR AND SER_NO = A.SER_NO) D_VSSL_KOR_NM , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppAgentCode#) AGENT_NM1 , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM2 , SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AGENT_CODE1 , A.YR||'-'||A.SER_NO AS YICN , A.BILL_DT , A.DC_CODE , A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , DECODE(A.IN_OUT ,'1','외항','2','내항') AS IXTN , A.YR , A.SER_NO , SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AS MCTMC , A.REMARK , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM3 , A.STANDARD_FEE , A.EXMP_AMNT , A.FAC_CODE||'-'||A.FAC_SUB_CODE AS FAC_CODE , E.FAC_KOR_NM , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R1_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R2_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R3_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R6_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R1_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R2_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R3_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R6_FARE_PA , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R4' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) END ) AS FARE , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) END ) AS FARE_PA , A.FISCAL_YR , A.SOC_NO , F.SOC_CNST_NM , F.TOTAL_AMNT , P2MGR.SF_ARVL_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) ARVL_DT , P2MGR.SF_DEP_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) DEP_DT ,( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('I',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), Y.USE_DT_FR), 'YYYY/MM/DD')||'~'|| TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('O',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),Y.USE_DT_TO), 'YYYY/MM/DD') ) FROM P2MGR.BILL_RQR_F@YGPA_P2MGR X ,P2MGR.FACIL_USE_F@YGPA_P2MGR Y WHERE X.PRT_AT_CODE = A.EXMP_PRT_AT_CODE AND X.FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND X.FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND X.BILL_NO = DECODE(X.PAST_YN,'Y',A.SOC_NO,A.BILL_NO) AND X.VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND X.SAVE='Y' AND (X.PRT_AT_CODE=Y.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND X.VSSL_KEY=Y.VSSL_KEY(+) AND X.YR=Y.YR(+) AND X.SER_NO=Y.SER_NO(+) AND X.USE_NO=Y.USE_NO(+)) ) USDT FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR A , P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B , PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F C , P2MGR.VSSL_F@YGPA_P2MGR D , P2MGR.FACIL_NM_F@YGPA_P2MGR E , P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F WHERE 1=1
AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode# AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND A.CONST_NO = #sConstNo# AND A.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr# AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode# AND A.FEE_TP LIKE #sFeeTp# || '%' AND ((A.BILL_DT >= #sDtFr# AND A.BILL_DT < #sDtTo#) OR (A.IO_DT >= #sIoDt# AND A.IO_DT < #sIoDt2#)) AND A.FAC_CODE LIKE #sFacCode#||'%' AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE LIKE #sFacSubCode#||'%' AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = C.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND A.FEE_TP = C.FEE_TP(+)) AND (A.CALL_LETTER = D.CALL_LETTER(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = E.PRT_AT_CODE (+) AND A.FAC_CODE = E.FAC_CODE(+) AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE = E.FAC_SUB_CODE(+)) AND F.PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND F.CMPL_YR = A.CMPL_YR AND F.CONST_NO = A.CONST_NO
ORDER BY A.BILL_DT, A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.CALL_LETTER, A.YR,A.SER_NO, A.FISCAL_YR, A.SOC_NO
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , B.PRT_KOR_NM , A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.CMPL_YR , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM1 , A.APP_AGENT_CODE AS SCTMC , A.USE_NO , A.FEE_TP , C.FEE_TP_KOR_NM , A.FISCAL_YR||'-'||A.SOC_NO YR_NO , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_CALL_LETTER@YGPA_P2MGR(A.VSSL_KEY) CALL_LETTER , A.VSSL_KEY , (SELECT VSSL_NM FROM P2MGR.VSSL_ARVL_F@YGPA_P2MGR WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND YR = A.YR AND SER_NO = A.SER_NO) D_VSSL_KOR_NM , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppAgentCode#) AGENT_NM1 , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM2 , SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AGENT_CODE1 , A.YR||'-'||A.SER_NO AS YICN , A.BILL_DT , A.DC_CODE , A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , DECODE(A.IN_OUT ,'1','외항','2','내항') AS IXTN , A.YR , A.SER_NO , SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AS MCTMC , A.REMARK , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM3 , A.STANDARD_FEE , A.EXMP_AMNT , A.FAC_CODE||'-'||A.FAC_SUB_CODE AS FAC_CODE , E.FAC_KOR_NM , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R1_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R2_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R3_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R6_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R1_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R2_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R3_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R6_FARE_PA , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R4' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) END ) AS FARE , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) END ) AS FARE_PA , A.FISCAL_YR , A.SOC_NO , F.SOC_CNST_NM , F.TOTAL_AMNT , P2MGR.SF_ARVL_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) ARVL_DT , P2MGR.SF_DEP_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) DEP_DT ,( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('I',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), Y.USE_DT_FR), 'YYYY/MM/DD')||'~'|| TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('O',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),Y.USE_DT_TO), 'YYYY/MM/DD') ) FROM P2MGR.BILL_RQR_F@YGPA_P2MGR X ,P2MGR.FACIL_USE_F@YGPA_P2MGR Y WHERE X.PRT_AT_CODE = A.EXMP_PRT_AT_CODE AND X.FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND X.FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND X.BILL_NO = DECODE(X.PAST_YN,'Y',A.SOC_NO,A.BILL_NO) AND X.VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND X.SAVE='Y' AND (X.PRT_AT_CODE=Y.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND X.VSSL_KEY=Y.VSSL_KEY(+) AND X.YR=Y.YR(+) AND X.SER_NO=Y.SER_NO(+) AND X.USE_NO=Y.USE_NO(+)) ) USDT FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR A , P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B , PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F C , P2MGR.VSSL_F@YGPA_P2MGR D , P2MGR.FACIL_NM_F@YGPA_P2MGR E , P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F WHERE 1=1
AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode# AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND A.CONST_NO = #sConstNo# AND A.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr# AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode# AND A.FEE_TP LIKE #sFeeTp# || '%' AND ((A.BILL_DT >= #sDtFr# AND A.BILL_DT < #sDtTo#) OR (A.IO_DT >= #sIoDt# AND A.IO_DT < #sIoDt2#)) AND A.FAC_CODE LIKE #sFacCode#||'%' AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE LIKE #sFacSubCode#||'%' AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = C.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND A.FEE_TP = C.FEE_TP(+)) AND (A.CALL_LETTER = D.CALL_LETTER(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = E.PRT_AT_CODE (+) AND A.FAC_CODE = E.FAC_CODE(+) AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE = E.FAC_SUB_CODE(+)) AND F.PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND F.CMPL_YR = A.CMPL_YR AND F.CONST_NO = A.CONST_NO
ORDER BY A.BILL_DT, A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.CALL_LETTER, A.YR,A.SER_NO, A.FISCAL_YR, A.SOC_NO )

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , B.PRT_KOR_NM , A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.CMPL_YR , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM1 , A.APP_AGENT_CODE AS SCTMC , A.USE_NO , A.FEE_TP , C.FEE_TP_KOR_NM , A.FISCAL_YR||'-'||A.SOC_NO YR_NO , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_CALL_LETTER@YGPA_P2MGR(A.VSSL_KEY) CALL_LETTER , A.VSSL_KEY , (SELECT VSSL_NM FROM P2MGR.VSSL_ARVL_F@YGPA_P2MGR WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND YR = A.YR AND SER_NO = A.SER_NO) D_VSSL_KOR_NM , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppAgentCode#) AGENT_NM1 , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM2 , SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AGENT_CODE1 , A.YR||'-'||A.SER_NO AS YICN , A.BILL_DT , A.DC_CODE , A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , DECODE(A.IN_OUT ,'1','외항','2','내항') AS IXTN , A.YR , A.SER_NO , SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AS MCTMC , A.REMARK , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM3 , A.STANDARD_FEE , A.EXMP_AMNT , A.FAC_CODE||'-'||A.FAC_SUB_CODE AS FAC_CODE , E.FAC_KOR_NM , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R1_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R2_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R3_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R6_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R1_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R2_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R3_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R6_FARE_PA , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R4' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) END ) AS FARE , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) END ) AS FARE_PA , A.FISCAL_YR , A.SOC_NO , F.SOC_CNST_NM , F.TOTAL_AMNT , P2MGR.SF_ARVL_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) ARVL_DT , P2MGR.SF_DEP_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) DEP_DT ,( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('I',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), Y.USE_DT_FR), 'YYYY/MM/DD')||'~'|| TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('O',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),Y.USE_DT_TO), 'YYYY/MM/DD') ) FROM P2MGR.BILL_RQR_F@YGPA_P2MGR X ,P2MGR.FACIL_USE_F@YGPA_P2MGR Y WHERE X.PRT_AT_CODE = A.EXMP_PRT_AT_CODE AND X.FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND X.FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND X.BILL_NO = DECODE(X.PAST_YN,'Y',A.SOC_NO,A.BILL_NO) AND X.VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND X.SAVE='Y' AND (X.PRT_AT_CODE=Y.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND X.VSSL_KEY=Y.VSSL_KEY(+) AND X.YR=Y.YR(+) AND X.SER_NO=Y.SER_NO(+) AND X.USE_NO=Y.USE_NO(+)) ) USDT FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR A , P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B , PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F C , P2MGR.VSSL_F@YGPA_P2MGR D , P2MGR.FACIL_NM_F@YGPA_P2MGR E , P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F WHERE 1=1
AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode# AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND A.CONST_NO = #sConstNo# AND A.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr# AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode# AND A.FEE_TP LIKE #sFeeTp# || '%' AND ((A.BILL_DT >= #sDtFr# AND A.BILL_DT < #sDtTo#) OR (A.IO_DT >= #sIoDt# AND A.IO_DT < #sIoDt2#)) AND A.FAC_CODE LIKE #sFacCode#||'%' AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE LIKE #sFacSubCode#||'%' AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = C.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND A.FEE_TP = C.FEE_TP(+)) AND (A.CALL_LETTER = D.CALL_LETTER(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = E.PRT_AT_CODE (+) AND A.FAC_CODE = E.FAC_CODE(+) AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE = E.FAC_SUB_CODE(+)) AND F.PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND F.CMPL_YR = A.CMPL_YR AND F.CONST_NO = A.CONST_NO
ORDER BY A.BILL_DT, A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.CALL_LETTER, A.YR,A.SER_NO, A.FISCAL_YR, A.SOC_NO
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT , NVL(SUM(R1_FARE),0) AS SUM_R1_FARE , NVL(SUM(R2_FARE),0) AS SUM_R2_FARE , NVL(SUM(R3_FARE),0) AS SUM_R3_FARE , NVL(SUM(R6_FARE),0) AS SUM_R6_FARE , NVL(SUM(DECODE(FEE_TP, 'R1', R1_FARE, 'R2', R2_FARE, 'R4', R6_FARE, R3_FARE)),0) AS SUM_R_FARE , NVL(SUM(R1_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R1_FARE_PA , NVL(SUM(R2_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R2_FARE_PA , NVL(SUM(R3_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R3_FARE_PA , NVL(SUM(R6_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R6_FARE_PA , NVL(SUM(DECODE(FEE_TP, 'R1', R1_FARE_PA, 'R2', R2_FARE_PA, R3_FARE_PA)),0) AS SUM_R_FARE_PA , NVL(SUM(R1_FARE + R1_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R1_ALL , NVL(SUM(R2_FARE + R2_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R2_ALL , NVL(SUM(R3_FARE + R3_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R3_ALL , NVL(SUM(R6_FARE + R6_FARE_PA),0) AS SUM_R6_ALL , NVL(SUM(DECODE(FEE_TP, 'R1', R1_FARE, 'R2', R2_FARE, 'R4', R6_FARE, R3_FARE) + DECODE(FEE_TP, 'R1', R1_FARE_PA, 'R2', R2_FARE_PA, R3_FARE_PA)),0) AS SUM_R_ALL FROM ( SELECT A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , B.PRT_KOR_NM , A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.CMPL_YR , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sPrtAtCode#) PRT_AT_NM1 , A.APP_AGENT_CODE AS SCTMC , A.USE_NO , A.FEE_TP , C.FEE_TP_KOR_NM , A.FISCAL_YR||'-'||A.SOC_NO YR_NO , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_CALL_LETTER@YGPA_P2MGR(A.VSSL_KEY) CALL_LETTER , A.VSSL_KEY , (SELECT VSSL_NM FROM P2MGR.VSSL_ARVL_F@YGPA_P2MGR WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND YR = A.YR AND SER_NO = A.SER_NO) D_VSSL_KOR_NM , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sAppAgentCode#) AGENT_NM1 , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM2 , SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.APP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AGENT_CODE1 , A.YR||'-'||A.SER_NO AS YICN , A.BILL_DT , A.DC_CODE , A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , DECODE(A.IN_OUT ,'1','외항','2','내항') AS IXTN , A.YR , A.SER_NO , SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,1,2)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,3,1)||'-'||SUBSTRB(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE,4,4) AS MCTMC , A.REMARK , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(A.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) AGENT_NM3 , A.STANDARD_FEE , A.EXMP_AMNT , A.FAC_CODE||'-'||A.FAC_SUB_CODE AS FAC_CODE , E.FAC_KOR_NM , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R1_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R2_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R3_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) AS R6_FARE , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R1_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R2_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R3_FARE_PA , DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0),0) AS R6_FARE_PA , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0)) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R4' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1', 0, 'R2', 0, 'R3', 0 , EXMP_AMNT),0)) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT',0, NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0)) END ) AS FARE , ( CASE WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R1' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R1',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) WHEN A.FEE_TP = 'R2' THEN DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R2',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) ELSE DECODE(JINGSUJA,'PAT', NVL(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3',EXMP_AMNT),0),0) END ) AS FARE_PA , A.FISCAL_YR , A.SOC_NO , F.SOC_CNST_NM , F.TOTAL_AMNT , P2MGR.SF_ARVL_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) ARVL_DT , P2MGR.SF_DEP_DT_REV@YGPA_P2MGR(A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.VSSL_KEY, A.YR, A.SER_NO ) DEP_DT ,( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('I',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), Y.USE_DT_FR), 'YYYY/MM/DD')||'~'|| TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.FEE_TP,'R3', TO_DATE(P2MGR.SF_GET_IO_DATE@YGPA_P2MGR('O',X.PRT_AT_CODE, X.VSSL_KEY, X.YR, X.SER_NO),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),Y.USE_DT_TO), 'YYYY/MM/DD') ) FROM P2MGR.BILL_RQR_F@YGPA_P2MGR X ,P2MGR.FACIL_USE_F@YGPA_P2MGR Y WHERE X.PRT_AT_CODE = A.EXMP_PRT_AT_CODE AND X.FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND X.FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND X.BILL_NO = DECODE(X.PAST_YN,'Y',A.SOC_NO,A.BILL_NO) AND X.VSSL_KEY = A.VSSL_KEY AND X.SAVE='Y' AND (X.PRT_AT_CODE=Y.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND X.VSSL_KEY=Y.VSSL_KEY(+) AND X.YR=Y.YR(+) AND X.SER_NO=Y.SER_NO(+) AND X.USE_NO=Y.USE_NO(+)) ) USDT FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR A , P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B , PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F C , P2MGR.VSSL_F@YGPA_P2MGR D , P2MGR.FACIL_NM_F@YGPA_P2MGR E , P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F WHERE 1=1
AND A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode# AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND A.CONST_NO = #sConstNo# AND A.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr# AND A.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode# AND A.FEE_TP LIKE #sFeeTp# || '%' AND ((A.BILL_DT >= #sDtFr# AND A.BILL_DT < #sDtTo#) OR (A.IO_DT >= #sIoDt# AND A.IO_DT < #sIoDt2#)) AND A.FAC_CODE LIKE #sFacCode#||'%' AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE LIKE #sFacSubCode#||'%' AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = C.PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND A.FEE_TP = C.FEE_TP(+)) AND (A.CALL_LETTER = D.CALL_LETTER(+)) AND (A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = E.PRT_AT_CODE (+) AND A.FAC_CODE = E.FAC_CODE(+) AND A.FAC_SUB_CODE = E.FAC_SUB_CODE(+)) AND F.PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND F.CMPL_YR = A.CMPL_YR AND F.CONST_NO = A.CONST_NO
ORDER BY A.BILL_DT, A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, A.CALL_LETTER, A.YR,A.SER_NO, A.FISCAL_YR, A.SOC_NO )
